pr_title: Reapply "Throw exception instead of returning null when reading application id"

timeline.message: Revert "Revert "Throw exception instead of returning null when reading application id…""

Add and use getOptionalApplicationId in some places

In some scenarios data might be missing in ZooKeeper, in those
cases handle that instead of failing
Add test of expiring a local session that has no zookeeper data

timeline.bodyText: It would perhaps be better if the readApplicationId() returned an optional, and getApplicationId() threw on empty? I fear something else may go wrong, and we then believe that was because the id didn't exist, even though it does.
timeline.author: jonmv

timeline.message: Return Optional when reading application id from zookeeper
